src: ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( name ( ari ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : I 'd like to have a little coffee before seeing the doctor . # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) @ G ( LC , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : Ah yes , that 's a good idea , so we 'll ... # acknowledge ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) LC : Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : Ok , perfect . # acknowledge ( ) @ CG ( LC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : We 'll be able to have a coffee or something else . [start] ARI : No . [MASK] LC : Ok. We 'll go straight to the counter . [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . [MASK] RP : Ok. [MASK] RP : Let 's go then . LC : We 'll ask for coffee . LC : Yes , yes . [MASK] LC : We 're going to go see the doctor . LC : Are there many people waiting in radiology ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Ok , it 's clear . [MASK] RP : So maybe we 'll go through the reception area again ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes , ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : We 're going to ask him how to get there . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] [MASK] RP : Now I 'm a little bit lost , I do n't know which corridor we came from . [MASK] LC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : And which corridor to take to get to the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : I may have to go to the toilet before . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Where are the toilets , please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] [end] RP : I 'll let you go to the toilet , I 'll wait for you . LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : Do you want to go to the toilet ? # suggest ( going-to ( toilet ) ) @ G ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Oh yes . And it 's urgent . # affirm ( ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Well , thanks anyway . [MASK] ARI : Thank you very much . [MASK] LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Oh , but I do n't know . RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Do you have another number for me ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Okay well , thank you then . [MASK] LC : The appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . [MASK] RP : My appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RP : An appointment of ... gerontology . ARI : Of course . [MASK] RP : Where should I ... Where should I go in the hospital ? [MASK] [end] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RP : Ca n't you tell me what floor ? ARI : Yes . Of course . # affirm ( ) RP : Oh , that 's nice . # give-feedback ( positive ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . # bye ( )

[MASK] [MASK] LP : I have an appointment in room 17 , where is it ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : And he 's a bit lost , he has an appointment , he 's been asked to go to , to go to room 17 . Could you tell us where to go , please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Is it wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Is the lift wheelchair accessible ? Can he use the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] [MASK] LP : I have an appointment at 10 AM , how long ... ah well yes ... [MASK] RC : He has an appointment at 10 o'clock . Do you know if there is a waiting time , if he has time for a coffee or do we have to go straight to the treatment room ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : No , there are n't too many people . src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? src: LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . [start] LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Yes , I think so . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where do I go for information ? [MASK] [MASK] LP : I 'd like a coffee . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . # inform ( beverage ( coffee ) ) ; inform ( location ( cafe ) ) @ AG ( LP , drink ( coffee ) ) ; AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) LP : How do we get to the ground floor ? # request ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) RC : How do we get to the ground floor ? # request ( directions ( ground_floor ) ) @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( ground_floor ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Which floor is the cafeteria on ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Where is the cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : How much time do we have for a coffee before the first consultation ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three .
